title: Professional icing at home
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery, Australian
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Baking

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Desserts
description: Jean Bowring demonstrates how to decorate a birthday cake using simple equipment and techniques. A fruit cake is first covered with fondant icing and then decorated using an icing bag and assortment of tubes. The film concludes with examples of more elaborate work in which the same simple techniques of decoration have been used.
